articles.title: Sea of Thieves gives players new goals — and pirates more tempting targets - Polygon
articles.description: Rare has added a new update to Sea of Thieves that adds cats, a new Arena mode, and the Emissary system. This Emissary system adds an opt-in hard mode with better rewards, but added risk, as player pirates may hunt them down as part of the Reapers’ Bones.
articles.content: April 22 marks a new Sea of Thieves expansion, Ships of Fortune, an update that focuses entirely on the player. Previous expansions have been all about big, external enemies: skeleton lords, treachery, exploding volcanos, or megalodons but now, man is the rea… [+3748 chars]

articles.content: Apple last week surprised us with the early launch of the new Magic Keyboard designed for the 2018 and 2020 iPad Pro models, and as of this week, orders are arriving to customers. We picked up one of the new Magic Keyboards for the 12.9-inch ‌iPad Pro‌ and te… [+5603 chars]

articles.author: Dan Thorp-Lancaster
articles.title: Lenovo's budget IdeaPad 5 with latest AMD Ryzen CPUs now available - Windows Central
articles.description: Lenovo's new IdeaPad 5 is now up for grab in both the U.S. and UK. Starting at around £405 or $690 depending on your model, the laptop is a budget affair, but it should still pack plenty of power thanks to AMD's latest mobile chips.
articles.content: Lenovo has a new budget laptop on the scene, and it's chocked full of new AMD goodness. The new Lenovo IdeaPad 5 is now on sale in both the U.S. and UK, bringing AMD's latest Ryzen 4000 Series chips at a price that doesn't break the bank. You can currently sc… [+995 chars]

articles.author: Cass Marshall
articles.title: Fallout 76 fans say the new NPCs are looting their dead bodies - Polygon
articles.description: Fallout 76 fans are reporting an odd bug with the introduction of Wastelanders. During open world events, NPCs are taking weapons off the bodies of players — and they’re not returning them.
articles.content:
Fallout 76s new Wastelanders expansion is a solid update that brings a traditional Fallout-style RPG structure, NPCs and all, to the once-barren hills of Appalachia. But some of the bugs players are discovering are as unfortunate as they are hilarious.
